channel.title: Problems
channel.description:
I want to know how to: 1. Make owners teleport out of 20+ wild 2. The owner (me) attack anyone even though they aren't in wildy 3. Add a skull when someone is pking 4. Change the Chatbox look/picture when I don't have a Sprites folder 5. When someone is a donator, it shows a different message as a non-donor in sidebar interface 7 [code] setSidebarInterface(7, 19510); // donor tab
if(officialClient){ if(Donator > 0){ setSidebarInterface(7, 19500);} // clan chat
}[/code] it still doesn't work
Please help me do these :D

item.title: Problems
item.dc:creator: @gangsta_tony gangsta tony
item.description:
@gangsta_tony wrote:

I want to know how to:

  1. Make owners teleport out of 20+ wild
  2. The owner (me) attack anyone even though they aren’t in wildy
  3. Add a skull when someone is pking
  4. Change the Chatbox look/picture when I don’t have a Sprites folder
  5. When someone is a donator, it shows a different message as a non-donor in sidebar interface 7

[code] setSidebarInterface(7, 19510); // donor tab

if(officialClient){
if(Donator > 0){
setSidebarInterface(7, 19500);} // clan chat

}[/code]
it still doesn’t work

Please help me do these

Read full topic
